FlatSequenceFrame Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Content RectReturns the size of the visible portion of a frame diagram on a Flat Sequence structure. Details
DiagramReturns a reference to the diagram of the Flat Sequence structure. Details
Frame SizeGets or sets the height and width of a Flat Sequence structure frame. Details
Left Side Inner Tunnels[]Returns an array of references to inner tunnels on the left side of a Flat Sequence structure. Details
Outer Tunnels[]Returns an array of references to outer tunnels on a Flat Sequence structure. Details
Right Side Inner Tunnels[]Returns an array of references to inner tunnels on the right side of a Flat Sequence structure. Details
